SELECT id=null, waterMeterCode =STUFF ( ( SELECT ',' +water_meter_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_meter WHERE use_water_unit_id = t1.id FOR XML PATH ( '' ) ), 1, 1, '' ), t1.id AS useWaterUnitId , t1.unit_code as unitCode, t1.unit_name as unitName, isnull(t2.baseWaterAmount,0) as baseWaterAmount, algorithmType=0, minusPayStatus=0, balanceTest=0, createType=0, planed=0, printed=0, added=1, assessQuarter=0, planYear=#{year}, ISNULL(t2.nowPrice,0) as nowPrice, isnull(t3.cur_year_plan,0) as curYearPlan, isnull(t3.curYearBasePlan,0) as curYearBasePlan, threeYearAvg = isnull( t2.baseWaterAmount * 2, 0 ), nextYearQuotaStartPlan=isnull(t4.nextYearQuotaStartPlan,0) from
( SELECT id, unit_code, unit_name, unit_code_group, unit_code_type, save_unit_type FROM t_w_use_water_unit uu
inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as tt on uu.unit_code_type=tt.unit_type_code WHERE deleted = '0' and node_code=#{nodeCode}
and id not in(select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_original_plan where plan_year=#{year} AND node_code=#{nodeCode}) ) t1
left join ( SELECT MAX ( now_price ) AS nowPrice, use_water_unit_id, SUM ( three + four ) AS baseWaterAmount FROM ( SELECT n1.use_water_unit_id, n1.now_price, three, four FROM ( SELECT now_price, use_water_unit_id, water_meter_code, three = ${threeWaterMonth} FROM t_w_water_month_use_data WHERE use_year =#{ParamOne} ) n1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_id, water_meter_code, four = ${fourWaterMonth} FROM t_w_water_month_use_data WHERE use_year = #{ParamTwo} )n2 ON n1.water_meter_code = n2.water_meter_code ) nn GROUP BY nn.use_water_unit_id ) t2 on t1.id = t2.use_water_unit_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.use_water_unit_id, p.cur_year_plan , ISNULL( bp.cur_year_plan, 0 ) AS curYearBasePlan FROM ( SELECT use_water_unit_id, cur_year_plan FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE plan_type = 0 AND plan_year= #{year}-1 ) p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cur_year_plan, use_water_unit_id FROM t_w_use_water_base_plan WHERE plan_year = #{year}-1 ) bp ON p.use_water_unit_id = bp.use_water_unit_id ) t3 ON t1.id = t3.use_water_unit_id left join( select a.use_water_unit_id, sum(b.common_value * a.amount * b.quota_rate) as nextYearQuotaStartPlan from t_w_use_water_quota as a inner join t_w_quota_info as b on a.product=b.id group by a.use_water_unit_id ) t4 on t4.use_water_unit_id=t1.id ORDER BY cast(substring(t1.unit_code,5,9) as integer)
